title: Riot's New Client and new gamemodes.
body: After learning about what Riot has in store in the future (card game, mmo?, fps, and a mobile version) as well as the more recent update to Riot's Client. Should we expect the client to be able to switch through the games? Kind of how Blizzard has their client setup.  Either way, I'm super hype about what's in store {{summoner:14}} {{summoner:14}}

replies.body: the only thing i'm nor particularly on board with is that the console version will require a different account than the pc version because that would mean the skins need to be repurchased/reunlocked too
Yes, that is the whole point of the new launcher. Right now it's just a wrapper for LoL, but eventually it'll have the new games.
